title: The PiG Daily #53 | Angry Boys! - BM ICYFAR #12 (Part 1)
excerpt: THIS WEEKS ICYFAR: "Striking from the Shadows" - Submit your games using cloaked, burrowed or invisible units! Send submissions to eonblu95@gmail.com as attachment. Lastest submission until the second daily of the week (Monday in EU/US, Tuesday in AUS/KR). Full Playlist of Daily VoDs: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFUDU8AOevUdOq5x--TBFC-p54CMWM4Fb
